text: The Affairs of Susan is a 1945 American romantic comedy movie. It was directed by William A. Seiter. Actors include Joan Fontaine, George Brent, Dennis O'Keefe, and Walter Abel. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1946. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1945 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by William A. Seiter
title: The Affairs of Susan
